properties.name: jwt.secret
properties.description: JWT secret key for signing tokens. Must be at least 32 characters long. Set via JWT_SECRET environment variable.

properties.name: jwt.access-token-expiration
properties.description: Access token expiration time in milliseconds. Default: 900000 (15 minutes). Set via JWT_ACCESS_TOKEN_EXPIRATION environment variable.

properties.name: jwt.refresh-token-expiration
properties.description: Refresh token expiration time in milliseconds. Default: 604800000 (7 days). Set via JWT_REFRESH_TOKEN_EXPIRATION environment variable.

properties.name: cors.allowed-origins
properties.description: Comma-separated list of allowed CORS origins. Set via CORS_ALLOWED_ORIGINS environment variable.

properties.name: supabase.url
properties.description: Supabase project URL. Set via SUPABASE_URL environment variable.

properties.name: supabase.apiKey
properties.description: Supabase API key. Set via SUPABASE_API_KEY environment variable.

properties.name: google.translate.api.key
properties.description: Google Cloud Translation API key. Get from https://console.cloud.google.com/apis/credentials. Set via GOOGLE_TRANSLATE_API_KEY environment variable.

properties.name: google.translate.api.url
properties.description: Google Cloud Translation API base URL. Default: https://translation.googleapis.com/language/translate/v2. Set via GOOGLE_TRANSLATE_API_URL environment variable.
